name: Sweet Potato Pie
keywords: dessert, fall, pie shell, sweetened condensed milk, yams, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 medium to large sweet potatoes (about 1 1/2 pounds), peeled, boiled and mashed to make about 2 1/2 cups

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl cream the butter and sugar together. Mix in the eggs, vanilla, nutmeg, cinnamon and salt. Add the mashed sweet potatoes and condensed milk and mix well.
Lightly prick the pie shell, pour in the filling and bake about 1 hour, until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
